name: Inyathi Tractor
description: Built with High-Grade Steel, Robust and Heavy-Duty components for exceptional durability. The Feeder breaker offers outstanding stability, enhanced conveying capacity and efficient crashing ability. Its construction extends operating time and ensures superior performance.
